CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 2, 1957, pg. A8, reads: "Guiding Light - The Rev. Marvin E. Barrett, pastor of Avery Memorial AME Zion Church, North Side, hopes to rebuild the ancient church in the same spirit as its benefactor, the late Rev. Charles Avery... - Harris Photo."The church was razed in 1969 for the construction of I-279.
TitMainTitle: Rev. Marvin E. Barrett preaching in Avery Memorial AME Zion Church, with banner inscribed "The Avery Beautiful Rally" fundraiser, September 1956 - June..."
